title: Should pantheon get a rework or remodel?
body:
I always thought pantheon is a cool concept of warrior that fights for war and stuff but his model is just disappointing and is outdated and his big ol' feet 

And his q is boring maybe make his q just like gp's q so he can be useful with kelpto and never be out of mana

replies.body: well you had a great point in the first half, but damn never running out of Mana I CANT SEE A PROBLEM WITH THIS AT ALL.

Full rework his kit is unfun to play against and is boring given his lore, and really doesn't show skill, not the most out dated but still out dated and his model is pretty bad.

I would say keep his ult and keep his q but make it a skill shoot and for his look I want the overall idea the same but more character in it not just generic spartan guy.
